title: Virtual Book Store using MVC 📚
description: A platform developed in .NET MVC Core for easy and intuitive book sales and management.

title: Integration API with BrasilAPI 🌐
description: This API allows integration with BrasilAPI to search for information about banks and addresses by ZIP code.

title: CRUD with SQLite using Entity Framework 💾
description: Simple Create, Read, Update and Delete API. SQLite database to store people's data and utilizes Entity Framework for data management.

title: E-mail Sending API 📧
description: This .NET API allows sending emails using the SMTP protocol in a simple and efficient manner. I developed this project for study purposes.
